title: Rajputana Peacock Haaram: A Symphony of Tradition and Elegance
materials: meticulously crafted with Hyderabadi polish. Features high-quality Rubies
features: This exquisite Haaram features a traditional Rajputana-inspired design. The centerpiece boasts two intricately designed peacocks, symbolizing beauty and grace, accented with vibrant Rubies and Emeralds. The pendant showcases exquisite filigree work encrusted with CZ stones. The chain is composed of two strands of meticulously set CZ stones, adding to the overall brilliance. Features gold beaded dangles on the pendant.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant accents of ruby red and emerald green. The CZ stones add a dazzling white sparkle.
occasions: and grand celebrations. This Haaram makes a statement at any special event.
description: A timeless design that blends Rajputana influence with South Indian jewelry aesthetics. The high-quality craftsmanship and the vibrant gemstones make it a truly special piece. Symbolizes prosperity, beauty, and grace, making it an ideal heirloom piece for generations to come. Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine.
